verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Send <S%H7971><s%> thou <S%H582>men<s%>, that they may <S%H8446>spy<s%> out the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, which I <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: of <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall ye <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H259>man<s%>, every <S%H259>one<s%> a prince among <S%H5387>them<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> them from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran<s%> according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: all of them <S%H582>men<s%> who <S%H1992>were<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And these were their <S%H8034>names<s%>: Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, <S%H8051>Shammua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2139>Zaccur<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, <S%H8202>Shaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2753>Hori<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, <S%H3008>Igal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, <S%H1954>Hoshea<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, <S%H6406>Palti<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7505>Raphu<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, <S%H1427>Gaddiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5476>Sodi<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, <S%H4294>namely<s%>, of the tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, <S%H1426>Gaddi<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5485>Susi<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, <S%H5988>Ammiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1582>Gemalli<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%>, <S%H5639>Sethur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4317>Michael<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, <S%H5147>Nahbi<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2058>Vophsi<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, <S%H1345>Geuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4352>Machi<s%>.

These are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to spy <S%H8446>out<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>. And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1954>Hoshea<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> them to spy <S%H8446>out<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5927>them<s%>, Get you up this way by the <S%H5045>South<s%>, and go <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%>:

and <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, what it <S%H5971>is<s%>; and the people that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H2389>therein<s%>, whether they are strong or <S%H7504>weak<s%>, whether they are <S%H4592>few<s%> or <S%H7227>many<s%>;

and what the <S%H776>land<s%> is that they dwell <S%H3427>in<s%>, whether it is <S%H2896>good<s%> or <S%H7451>bad<s%>; and what <S%H5892>cities<s%> they are that they <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H2007>in<s%>, whether in <S%H4264>camps<s%>, or in <S%H4013>strongholds<s%>;

and what the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8082>is<s%>, whether it is fat or <S%H7330>lean<s%>, whether there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H2388>therein<s%>, or not. And be ye of good courage, and <S%H3947>bring<s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>. Now the <S%H3117>time<s%> was the <S%H3117>time<s%> of the <S%H1061>first-ripe<s%> <S%H6025>grapes<s%>.

So they went <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H8446>spied<s%> out the <S%H776>land<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%> unto <S%H7340>Rehob<s%>, to the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>.

And they went <S%H5927>up<s%> by the <S%H5045>South<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>; and <S%H289>Ahiman<s%>, <S%H8344>Sheshai<s%>, and <S%H8526>Talmai<s%>, the <S%H3211>children<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%>, were <S%H2275>there<s%>. (Now Hebron was <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6814>Zoan<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.)

And they <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol<s%>, and cut <S%H3772>down<s%> from thence a <S%H2156>branch<s%> with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H811>cluster<s%> of <S%H6025>grapes<s%>, and they <S%H5375>bare<s%> it upon a <S%H4132>staff<s%> between <S%H8147>two<s%>; they brought also of the <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%>, and of the <S%H8384>figs<s%>.

That <S%H4725>place<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> the valley <S%H182>of<s%> <S%H812>Eshcol<s%>, because <S%H182>of<s%> the <S%H811>cluster<s%> which the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> cut down from <S%H3772>thence<s%>.
And they <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H8446>spying<s%> out the <S%H776>land<s%> at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And they <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and to <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and to all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, unto the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran<s%>, to <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%>; and brought <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> unto <S%H5712>them<s%>, and unto all the congregation, and <S%H7200>showed<s%> them the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And they <S%H5608>told<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, and said, We <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> whither thou <S%H7971>sentest<s%> <S%H2100>us<s%>; and surely it floweth with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>; and this is the fruit of <S%H6529>it<s%>.

Howbeit <S%H657><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> are <S%H5794>strong<s%>, and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H1219>fortified<s%>, and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%>: and moreover we <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H3211>children<s%> of Anak <S%H6061>there<s%>.

Amalek <S%H6002><s%> <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H5045>South<s%>: and the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%>, and the <S%H567>Amorite<s%>, <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%>; and the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> by the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and along by the <S%H3027>side<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>.

And <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H2013>stilled<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> before <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Let us go <S%H5927>up<s%> at <S%H5927>once<s%>, and <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H3201>it<s%>; for we are well able to overcome <S%H3201>it<s%>.

But the <S%H582>men<s%> that went <S%H5927>up<s%> with him <S%H559>said<s%>, We are not <S%H3201>able<s%> to go <S%H5927>up<s%> against the <S%H5971>people<s%>; for they are stronger than <S%H2389>we<s%>.

And they brought <S%H3318>up<s%> an evil <S%H1681>report<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> which they had <S%H8446>spied<s%> out unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H776>land<s%>, through which we have <S%H5674>gone<s%> to <S%H8446>spy<s%> it <S%H776>out<s%>, is a land that eateth <S%H398>up<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> <S%H5971>thereof<s%>; and all the people that we <S%H7200>saw<s%> in <S%H8432>it<s%> are <S%H582>men<s%> of great <S%H4060>stature<s%>.

And there we <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5303>Nephilim<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%>, who come of the <S%H5303>Nephilim<s%>: and we were in our own <S%H5869>sight<s%> as <S%H2284>grasshoppers<s%>, and so we were in their <S%H5869>sight<s%>.
